articles.title: Lion DNA convicts poachers in world first
articles.description: Investigators reveal how they were able to identify a missing animal using a database of lions in Zimbabwe.

articles.title: AfDB, IITA Launch $16.6m TAAT-III to Scale Climate-Smart Farming
articles.description: Working closely with CGIAR research centres and national partners, TAAT has delivered measurable productivity gains in countries including Sudan, Ethiopia, Zambia, Zimbabwe and Nigeria.

articles.title: How Zimbabwe wrote their redemption song
articles.description: Cricket News: For Zimbabwe cricket, not qualifying for the 2023 ODI World Cup and the 2024 T20 World Cup was a sobering setback. When Zimbabwe were told, they would.
